channel.title: USPTO Patent Events
channel.description: This feed provides easy access to USPTO Patents events.

item.title: Attend DOCX filing training
item.description: Learn how to file patent-related documents in DOCX format using Patent Center and EFS-Web during any of several free upcoming training sessions. You will hear from experts on the United States Patent and Trademark Office's (USPTO) eCommerce Modernization (eMod) team, who will provide demonstrations and answer your questions.

item.title: Attend DOCX filing training
item.description: Learn how to file patent-related documents in DOCX format using Patent Center and EFS-Web during any of several free upcoming training sessions. You will hear from experts on the United States Patent and Trademark Office's (USPTO) eCommerce Modernization (eMod) team, who will provide demonstrations and answer your questions.

item.title: The Path to a Patent, Part II: Drafting provisional patent applications
item.description: In this module, United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) experts discuss key differences between provisional and nonprovisional patent applications, filing requirements and fees, the different ways to file a provisional application, and more

item.title: The Path to a Patent, Part III: Patent searching
item.description: Are you interested in learning more about patent searching? Attend this virtual session and learn from United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) experts about preliminary searching, using the suggested Seven-Step Strategy, and more
